headline: Carrier Rebrands Global Command Centers to Advance Customer Outcomes
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced the rebranding of its global command centers as Carrier Customer Command Centers. The new identity underscores Carrier's customer-first commitment and the growing role of the centers in helping customers improve energy efficiency, increase equipment uptime, strengthen temperature compliance and lower maintenance costs.
